title: shrI kAmAkSi mAm pAhi
sahitya:
shrI kAmAkSi mAm pAhi


anupallavi

  EkAmrEshvari bhuvanEshvari vAgIshvarI sEvitE paradEvatE


caraNam    vitara janani tava padayuga drDha bhaktim ajnAna vipina viSaya vyAghra bhItAya mE patita pAvani 
bhakta pAlini paramEshvari suta sEnAni pAshAnkusha cApa bANa dhAriNi shrI nagara vAsini suvAsini
